law.catch_line: Curation and science unit -- Functions -- Qualifications of associate director.

text.section: The associate director of the curation and science unit shall have an earned doctorate in the biological, earth sciences, or anthropology with demonstrated experience in curation of biological or geological collections.

Information that would endanger natural heritage resources by revealing their location shall be exempt from KRS 61.870 to 61.884 unless:
The information is to be used for scientific research or in efforts to protect and preserve the resource;
The person requesting the information agrees in writing to keep confidential the location of the resource; and
The director determines that release of the information will not endanger the resource.

law.history: Created 2000 Ky. Acts ch. 329, sec. 7, effective July 14, 2000.
